title: ‘Let’s Go Brandon’ and Other Codes
sub_head: Disney World refers to a troublemaker as a  ‘treasured guest.’
body:
Staff at Disney World refer to a troublemaker as a “treasured guest.” A “Code Winnie” alert means someone urinated in the pool.
Speaking in code is nothing new, although it got unexpected attention on Christmas Eve when a father of four from Oregon called a “Santa Tracker” phone line staffed by Joe Biden and got the president to assent to the seemingly innocuous statement “Let’s go, Brandon.”
